Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object

    Vector2D

    This class represents a 2D vector and stores two components vectors Vx and Vy for a vector V
    Since:
    13-04-2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2D()
      Default constructor which produces a zero vector
      Vector2D(Coordinate coordinate1, Coordinate coordinate2)
      Constructor that produces a vector from one coordinate to a second coordinate
      Vector2D(double max_component)
      Constructor which produces a pseudo random vector with component vectors in the range of ± max_component
      Vector2D(double vX, double vY)
      Constructor which produces a vector V with Vx and Vy as component values

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Vector2D two)
      Adds this vector with another vector
      void div(double factor)
      Divides this vector with another vector
      double getAngle()
      Calculates the angle of the vector.
      double getLength()
      Calculates and returns the length(hypotenuses) of the vector
      double getX()
      Gets the X-component of the vector
      double getY()
      Gets the Y-component of the vector
      void inv()
      Inverts the current vector
      void mult(double factor)
      Multiplies this vector with another vector

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vector2D

        public Vector2D()
        Default constructor which produces a zero vector

      • Vector2D

        public Vector2D(double vX,
        double vY)
        Constructor which produces a vector V with Vx and Vy as component values
        Parameters:
        vX - Component vector Vx
        vY - Component vector Vy

      • Vector2D

        public Vector2D(double max_component)
        Constructor which produces a pseudo random vector with component vectors in the range of ± max_component
        Parameters:
        max_component - Component vectors will be set between ± this

      • Vector2D

        public Vector2D(Coordinate coordinate1,
        Coordinate coordinate2)
        Constructor that produces a vector from one coordinate to a second coordinate
        Parameters:
        coordinate1 - Coordinate one - Vector goes from this point
        coordinate2 - Coordinate two - Vector goes to this point

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Vector2D two)
        Adds this vector with another vector
        Parameters:
        two - Vector is added to the current vector

      • mult

        public void mult(double factor)
        Multiplies this vector with another vector
        Parameters:
        factor - Vector is multiplied by this factor

      • div

        public void div(double factor)
        Divides this vector with another vector
        Parameters:
        factor - Vector is divided by this factor

      • inv

        public void inv()
        Inverts the current vector

        Gets the X-component of the vector

      • getY

        Gets the Y-component of the vector
        Returns:
        Y-component

      • getLength

        public double getLength()
        Calculates and returns the length(hypotenuses) of the vector
        Returns:
        Returns the length of the vector

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Calculates the angle of the vector. The angle is given as theta in a polar coordinate
        Returns:
        Returns the angle(theta) of the vector
